results.overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.
results.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

results.original_title: 宇宙戦艦ヤマト2199 星巡る方舟
results.overview: 2199 AD. Yamato tried to leave behind the Large Magellanic Cloud galaxy, after receiving a "Cosmo Reverse System" at its destination, Iscandar. However, suddenly, it encounters a mysterious group at the edge of the Large Magellanic Cloud. The crew finds out that the group is called the "Gatlantis," and that its leader is the Gutaba expeditionary force commander who calls himself "Goran Dagaamu of Thunder." The commander demands that Yamato be handed over to him. Yamato, wanting to hurry to Earth, escapes the fray. However, Yamato is attacked by a devastating beam weapon called the "Flame Direct Attack Cannon" that can transcend space.
results.title: Space Battleship Yamato 2199: Odyssey of the Celestial Ark

results.overview: A space-obsessed man gets the opportunity of a lifetime thanks to a Mars colonization program but finds his plans compromised by his feelings for a woman who brings him down to Earth.
results.title: Space Oddity

results.overview: In 2011, Manchester DJ Fritz von Runte undertook a project that would fuse the music of David Bowie with the cinema of Stanley Kubrick. Using Bowie’s original tracks, he put together a CD and mp3 package called Bowie2001. The music was available as a free download. Also offered was a higher-quality full-length mix and a CD. To accompany the music, a free torrent of a 100-minute film was available. Called Bowie2001 - A Space Oddity, the movie rearranged visuals from Kubrick’s classic 2001 and matched them with von Runte’s Bowie mix.
results.title: Bowie2001- A Space Oddity

results.overview: Experimental short film by Michio Mihara.
results.title: 2005 Space Odyssey

results.overview: At an isolated outpost in the Arctic, the pioneering spirit of the Space Race clashes with the suspicions of the Cold War.
results.title: An Arctic Space Odyssey

results.original_title: Quantum Quest: A Cassini Space Odyssey
results.overview: Dave, a young photon, who is forced out of the Sun on a journey of discovery. He must get to the Cassini Space Craft and save it from the forces of the Void, only Dave does not know exactly what he must do or even where the Cassini Space craft is or what it is. The forces of the Void must destroy Cassini before it sends its great discoveries back to Earth and Dave is the only thing that stands between them and victory.
results.title: Quantum Quest: A Cassini Space Odyssey

results.overview: February 15th 2013. A meteor has burned its way through the atmosphere over the Ural region in Russia, its dazzling light brighter than the sun. In Kabelvåg, a small town in the north of Norway, the three close friends Ruby, Sebastian and Daniel celebrate their graduation. They have made plans for a future together, but much like the meteor, their destination and journey remains unclear.
results.title: Space Oddity

results.overview: Here, as often in Ange Leccia's shorts, pop music with universal overtones enhances the fascinating immateriality of the images while the 1969 song "Space Oddity" by the late musician David Bowie plays in the background.
results.title: Space Oddity

results.overview: A crow, Min-chul explores space to find a beak jewel which is the last part  of a jewel statue modeled after himself. One day, he finds the beak gem  on a remote planet. However, there was a shocking secret hidden in the  jewel..!
results.title: Space Oddity

results.original_title: Space Odyssey: Voyage to the Planets
results.overview: A programme revealing the dangers and spectacles of exploring other planets in the Solar System.  Join in the journey and dive below the ice of one of Jupiter's moons or get lost in a Venusian sulphuric acid storm...
results.title: Space Odyssey: Voyage to the Planets

results.overview: A job seeker studying in a tiny room receives an annoying text message and gets ready to go out.
results.title: 2088 Space Odyssey

results.overview: Short directed by Robert Mitchell and Robert Swarthe.
results.title: K-9000: A Space Oddity

results.overview: This is the story of the National Aeronautic Space Administration from the first Gemini mission to the space shuttle - a race for space which became the pinnacle of human achievement in the 20th century. From the incredible rescue of Apollo 13 to routine satellite launches from the space shuttle, come with us on a journey through history to distant galaxies, black holes and the origin of the universe itself.
results.title: NASA: A Space Odyssey Vol. 1

results.overview: The complete NASA Historical Film Library included on thirty individual volumes. Some include introductions by the Astronauts themselves. See individual volumes for details.
results.title: NASA: The American Space Odyssey

results.overview: Chronicles the story of NASA. From the legacy of Gemini and those first breathtaking walks in space to playing golf on the moon and to everyday life in space where little things can present the most amusing problems -- like eating breakfast!
results.title: NASA: A Space Odyssey Vol. 2

results.overview: What if other life was out there? Join us as we try to answer that most-asked question.l With millions of stars the possibility is more than that, it is a very high probability! Follow Pioneer 10 as is flies by our largest planet, the massive giant Jupiter, and learn the message Pioneer 10 carries as it leaves our solar system.. just in case!
results.title: NASA: A Space Odyssey Vol. 3

results.original_title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'
results.overview: Primer on the meaning, techniques and background of Stanley Kubrick's 1968 film "2001: A Space Odyssey." Keir Dullea, who starred in the film as astronaut Bowman, narrates on camera and over many excerpts from the film.
results.title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'

results.original_title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – A Look Behind the Future
results.overview: A short documentary about the making of Stanley Kubrick's 2001: A Space Odyssey and its impact on the '60s view of the future.
results.title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – A Look Behind the Future

results.original_title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – What Is Out There?
results.overview: Keir Dullea, interspersed with archive clips of Arthur C. Clarke, discusses the probability of extraterrestrial life.
results.title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – What Is Out There?
